accountKey.description: The account key (shared key) to access the storage account

containerName.description: The Azure Blob container name to sync from the url endpoint for the flux configuration.

managedIdentity.description: Parameters to authenticate using a Managed Identity.

sasToken.description: The Shared Access token to access the storage container

servicePrincipal.description: Parameters to authenticate using Service Principal.

syncIntervalInSeconds.description: The interval at which to re-reconcile the cluster Azure Blob source with the remote.

timeoutInSeconds.description: The maximum time to attempt to reconcile the cluster Azure Blob source with the remote.

url.description: The URL to sync for the flux configuration Azure Blob storage account.

accessKey.description: Plaintext access key used to securely access the S3 bucket

bucketName.description: The bucket name to sync from the url endpoint for the flux configuration.

insecure.description: Specify whether to use insecure communication when puling data from the S3 bucket.

localAuthRef.description: Name of a local secret on the Kubernetes cluster to use as the authentication secret rather than the managed or user-provided configuration secrets.

syncIntervalInSeconds.description: The interval at which to re-reconcile the cluster bucket source with the remote.

timeoutInSeconds.description: The maximum time to attempt to reconcile the cluster bucket source with the remote.

url.description: The URL to sync for the flux configuration S3 bucket.

azureBlob.description: Parameters to reconcile to the AzureBlob source kind type.

bucket.description: Parameters to reconcile to the Bucket source kind type.

configurationProtectedSettings.description: Key-value pairs of protected configuration settings for the configuration

gitRepository.description: Parameters to reconcile to the GitRepository source kind type.

kustomizations.description: Array of kustomizations used to reconcile the artifact pulled by the source type on the cluster.

namespace.description: The namespace to which this configuration is installed to. Maximum of 253 lower case alphanumeric characters, hyphen and period only.

ociRepository.description: Parameters to reconcile to the OCIRepository source kind type.

reconciliationWaitDuration.description: Maximum duration to wait for flux configuration reconciliation. E.g PT1H, PT5M, P1D

scope.description: Scope at which the operator will be installed.

sourceKind.description: Source Kind to pull the configuration data from.

suspend.description: Whether this configuration should suspend its reconciliation of its kustomizations and sources.

waitForReconciliation.description: Whether flux configuration deployment should wait for cluster to reconcile the kustomizations.

httpsCACert.description: Base64-encoded HTTPS certificate authority contents used to access git private git repositories over HTTPS

httpsUser.description: Plaintext HTTPS username used to access private git repositories over HTTPS

localAuthRef.description: Name of a local secret on the Kubernetes cluster to use as the authentication secret rather than the managed or user-provided configuration secrets.

repositoryRef.description: The source reference for the GitRepository object.

sshKnownHosts.description: Base64-encoded known_hosts value containing public SSH keys required to access private git repositories over SSH

syncIntervalInSeconds.description: The interval at which to re-reconcile the cluster git repository source with the remote.

timeoutInSeconds.description: The maximum time to attempt to reconcile the cluster git repository source with the remote.

url.description: The URL to sync for the flux configuration git repository.

dependsOn.description: Specifies other Kustomizations that this Kustomization depends on. This Kustomization will not reconcile until all dependencies have completed their reconciliation.

force.description: Enable/disable re-creating Kubernetes resources on the cluster when patching fails due to an immutable field change.

path.description: The path in the source reference to reconcile on the cluster.

postBuild.description: Used for variable substitution for this Kustomization after kustomize build.

prune.description: Enable/disable garbage collections of Kubernetes objects created by this Kustomization.

retryIntervalInSeconds.description: The interval at which to re-reconcile the Kustomization on the cluster in the event of failure on reconciliation.

syncIntervalInSeconds.description: The interval at which to re-reconcile the Kustomization on the cluster.

timeoutInSeconds.description: The maximum time to attempt to reconcile the Kustomization on the cluster.

wait.description: Enable/disable health check for all Kubernetes objects created by this Kustomization.

mediaType.description: The first layer matching the specified media type will be used.

operation.description: The operation to be performed on the selected layer. The default value is 'extract', but it can be set to 'copy'.

clientId.description: The client Id for authenticating a Managed Identity.

issuer.description: The regex pattern to match against to verify the OIDC issuer.

subject.description: The regex pattern to match against to verify the identity subject.

insecure.description: Specify whether to allow connecting to a non-TLS HTTP container registry.

layerSelector.description: The layer to be pulled from the OCI artifact.

localAuthRef.description: Name of a local secret on the Kubernetes cluster to use as the authentication secret rather than the managed or user-provided configuration secrets.

repositoryRef.description: The source reference for the OCIRepository object.

serviceAccountName.description: The service account name to authenticate with the OCI repository.

syncIntervalInSeconds.description: The interval at which to re-reconcile the cluster OCI repository source with the remote.

timeoutInSeconds.description: The maximum time to attempt to reconcile the cluster OCI repository source with the remote.

tlsConfig.description: Parameters to authenticate using TLS config for OCI repository.

url.description: The URL to sync for the flux configuration OCI repository.

useWorkloadIdentity.description: Specifies whether to use Workload Identity to authenticate with the OCI repository.

verify.description: Verification of the authenticity of an OCI Artifact.

digest.description: The image digest to pull from OCI repository, the value should be in the format ‘sha256:’. This takes precedence over semver.

semver.description: The semver range used to match against OCI repository tags. This takes precedence over tag.

tag.description: The OCI repository image tag name to pull. This defaults to 'latest'.

substitute.description: Key/value pairs holding the variables to be substituted in this Kustomization.

substituteFrom.description: Array of ConfigMaps/Secrets from which the variables are substituted for this Kustomization.

branch.description: The git repository branch name to checkout.

commit.description: The commit SHA to checkout. This value must be combined with the branch name to be valid. This takes precedence over semver.

semver.description: The semver range used to match against git repository tags. This takes precedence over tag.

tag.description: The git repository tag name to checkout. This takes precedence over branch.

clientCertificate.description: Base64-encoded certificate used to authenticate a Service Principal

clientCertificatePassword.description: The password for the certificate used to authenticate a Service Principal

clientCertificateSendChain.description: Specifies whether to include x5c header in client claims when acquiring a token to enable subject name / issuer based authentication for the Client Certificate

clientId.description: The client Id for authenticating a Service Principal.

clientSecret.description: The client secret for authenticating a Service Principal

tenantId.description: The tenant Id for authenticating a Service Principal

kind.description: Define whether it is ConfigMap or Secret that holds the variables to be used in substitution.

name.description: Name of the ConfigMap/Secret that holds the variables to be used in substitution.

optional.description: Set to True to proceed without ConfigMap/Secret, if it is not present.

caCertificate.description: Base64-encoded CA certificate used to verify the server.

clientCertificate.description: Base64-encoded certificate used to authenticate a client with the OCI repository.

privateKey.description: Base64-encoded private key used to authenticate a client with the OCI repository.

matchOidcIdentity.description: Array defining the criteria for matching the identity while verifying an OCI artifact.

verificationConfig.description: An object containing trusted public keys of trusted authors.
